function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Misinformation and rumors spread through radio and social media may foster confusion, distrust, or panic within the community.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stigma associated with contracting covid-19 and social distancing messages exacerbating social marginalization.","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gender-specific impacts, including increased caring burdens for women and girls, uneven earning potential, and higher exposure risk for female health workers.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"People working through illness due to need to make a living","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with quarantine and isolation measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restrictions on levels of crowding on public transport","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spreading of disinformation through social media and mainstream media","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid dissemination of preprints without critical review or verification","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of disinformation through preprints and press releases","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overreliance on preprints without comprehensive review","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid dissemination of unvetted preprints","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misleading or false information spread through preprints","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant differences in people’s habits of using existing community service facilities.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the concept of 15-10-5-min community life circle","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation to changing needs of residents","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordination between physical and virtual elements in community planning","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-contact interaction activities and virtual community spaces may impact the spatial structure of urban communities and the behavioral activities of residents, potentially leading to the neglect of other influencing factors.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on non-contact interactive activities leading to social isolation","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance of uv-c system leading to reduced disinfection effectiveness.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of germicidal irradiation in building operations","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited use of germicidal irradiation in civil buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased recreational activity during the covid-19 lockdown","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Substitution of prohibited indoor activities with outdoor activities","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of equal adoption of strava across cycling and pedestrian communities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of homogenous strava adoption over the city of oslo","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Intensified recreational activity in urban periphery","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interrupted weekly rhythm of recreational activity","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift in diurnal activity patterns during lockdown","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Less pronounced shift in weekday vs weekend activity during lockdown","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in cycling activity during lockdown","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of google search query data as proxy indicators may not fully capture outdoor recreational intention.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on strava data as a representation of recreational activity may not capture the full spectrum of users, potentially skewing the results.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uso de memes para difundir mensajes relacionados con la pandemia.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relacionar personajes populares con mensajes sobre la pandemia.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Estereotipos de género asociados a la distribución de roles en la sociedad durante la pandemia.","category":"Social and Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance with covid-19 measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Normalization of non-compliance with covid-19 measures","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of sustained compliance with public health measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Easing of restrictions leading to increased social gatherings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Erosion of moral support for compliance over time","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Noncompliance with stay at home and social distancing measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Intrinsic motivations influencing compliance","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitations of self-reported compliance data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid changes in people’s behavior and attitudes","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance to authority and measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with social distancing measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Backlash against authorities leading to resistance to compliance","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of social norm on compliance behavior","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequality in compliance due to practical limitations","category":"Social and Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential decline in compliant behavior over time","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
